question.body:
Bone remodeling allows for the skeletal response to mechanical use, and nutritional status. For each situation below decide if there would be a net overall resorption of bone or deposition of bone.
A person’s arm is immobilized because of an elbow problem.

response.feedback: Correct. Bone resorption can occur when a bone is not being placed under stress.
Incorrect. Bone deposition is more likely to occur with stresses on the bone, which do not occur when the arm is immobilized.

part.hint: This might be considered an example of form following function.

p.em: An astronaut is in low gravity for an extend time.

response.feedback: Correct. Bone resorption can occur when a bone is not being placed under stress.
Incorrect. Bone deposition would occur if there was stress on the bone.

part.hint: Even when astronauts “work” their body, the lack of gravity provides little resistance to muscles and the bones they are connected to.

p.em: There is excess calcium in the blood.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Bone resorption occurs when blood calcium levels are low.
Correct. Bone deposition occurs when parathyroid hormone levels are low, such as when blood calcium levels are high.

part.hint: Consider the feedback loop that regulates blood calcium levels.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Bone resorption involves active osteoclasts to break down the bone.
Correct. Bone deposition will occur because osteoblasts build new bone.

part.hint: Consider the role of osteoblasts in bone remodeling.

p.em: Along the margins of a bone fracture

response.feedback: Incorrect. Bone resorption would make the bone weaker as it removes mineral content from the bone.
Correct. Bone deposition will lay down new bone to allow for repair of the fracture.

part.hint: In order for a fracture to heal properly, what would have to happen to the bone?
